actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for contributions to individual retirement accounts as it existed before the Tax Reform Act of 1986.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to remove limitations on the deductibility of contributions to individual retirement plans by active participants in employer-maintained plans.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for contributions to individual retirement accounts as it existed before the Tax Reform Act of 1986.
